requirements_spec.description: Comprehensive 7taps API integration with PEM key authentication, webhook security, and real-time data processing

requirements.requirement: Implement 7taps API authentication with PEM keys
requirements.description: Secure authentication to 7taps API using PEM key authentication
Secure webhook endpoints with signature validation and rate limiting
Process 7taps data in real-time with streaming capabilities

requirements.requirement: Implement comprehensive error handling and monitoring
requirements.description: Robust error handling and monitoring for API integration
acceptance_criteria: API error handling and retry logic

requirements.description: Efficient data synchronization and caching for optimal performance

test_criteria.criteria: Must provide secure PEM key authentication
test_criteria.description: 7taps API authentication must be secure and reliable
Webhook endpoints must be secure and validated
Real-time data processing must be efficient and reliable
Error handling must be robust and comprehensive

test_criteria.criteria: Must provide data synchronization and caching
test_criteria.description: Data synchronization and caching must be efficient

adversarial_testing.description: Validate behavior with invalid or expired PEM keys
Attempt webhook signature forgery and validate rejection
Validate rate limiting and throttling behavior
Validate behavior during API connection failures
Validate data consistency and integrity under various conditions
